projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

lg.l: sāhitya-darpaṇīyā na gṛhītā prakriyā prāyaḥ // RNc_2 //
dhīreṇāḍhyam udāttena kṛṣṇaś ca lalitena ca // RNc_3 //
nāyakānāṃ guṇāḥ sarve yatra sarva-vidhāḥ smṛtāḥ // RNc_8 //
tat tu kṛṣṇaṃ ca gopīś ca vineti pratipāditam // RNc_10 //
neṣṭā yad aṅgini rase kavibhiḥ paroḍhā
anye hāsyādayaḥ kāryā asminn aṅgatayā budhaiḥ // RNc_12 //

div.p:
itivṛttaṃ bhavet khyātaṃ k ptaṃ miśram iti tridhā |
śāstra-prasiddhaṃ khyātaṃ syāt k ptaṃ kavi-vinirmitam |
tayoḥ saṅkulatā miśraṃ k ptaṃ ramyaṃ tu nāṭake |
nāṭakaṃ khyāta-vṛttaṃ syāt k pta-vṛttā tu nāṭikā |
īhāmṛgo miśra-vṛtta iti nāṭyāṅga-bhāṣitam ||

lg.l: prastāvanāyāṃ tu mukhe nāndī kāryā śubhāvahā ||
aṣṭabhir daśabhir yuktā kiṃ vā dvādaśabhiḥ padaiḥ ||
aṣṭau prokṣya dig-aṅganā ghana-rasaiḥ patrāṅkurāṇāṃ śriyā
yaḥ pīne hṛdi bhānujām atulabhāṃ candrākṛtiṃ cojjvalāṃ
rundhānaḥ kramate tam atra mudiraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ namaskurmahe ||

div.p: vastu-nirdeśānvitā cātraiva aṣṭau prokṣya digaṅganā ityādir eva |
aṣṭapada-yuktā yathā vīra-carite prathamāṅke (prastāvanāyāḥ prathamaḥ ślokaḥ)-
div.l: kaścid aṣṭa-padāṃ pādair aṣṭabhiḥ padyayor jagau // RNc_17 //

lg.l: bhāraty atrocitā vṛttir eṣā tu caturaṅgikā |
prarocanā mukhe caiva vīthī-prahasane tathā // RNc_18 //

div.p: sūtradhāraḥ | kim ity evam ucyate | paśya paśya --

lg.l: kim anyad iha mādhavo madhura-mūrtir udbhāsate
sūtradhāro naṭīṃ brūte svakāryaṃ prati yuktitaḥ |
prastutākṣepi citroktyā yat tad āmukham īritam // RNc_20 //
yad āmukham iti proktaṃ saiva pratsāvanocyate |
svīkṛtya praviśet pātraṃ kathodghātaḥ sa kīrtitaḥ // RNc_23 //

div.p: (nepathye) hanta bhoḥ satyam āttha lokottara-caritānāṃ hṛdayaṃ ko jñātum īśatīti ||
div.l: ākṣiptaṃ kāla-sāmyena pravṛttiḥ syāt pravartakam // RNc_24 //

lg.l: dhīraṃ numer api mano madayan samantād
preveśa-sūcanaṃ yatra prayogātiśayo hi saḥ // RNc_25 //
nirābādhaṃ sadā sādhu ramayaty eṣa mādhavaḥ ||
yojayanti padair anyais tad udghātyakam ucyate // RNc_26 //
abhivyaktam udāhartum asamartho naṭatā kirāta-rājam ity upadeśena bodhayan
dhanyaḥ ko'yaṃ cintā-viklavāṃ mām āśvāsayatīti tatra paurṇamāsī-praveśaḥ ||
purānurodhāt taj jñeyaṃ nāmnāvagalitaṃ budhaiḥ // RNc_27 //

div.p: (nepathye) bhoḥ kas tvam asi yad atra māṃ tvarayasi |
sūtradhāraḥ -- katham ayaṃ gopāla-veśo bhagavān upasthita eva paśya paśya ityādi ||

lg.l: śṛṅgāra-pracure nāṭye yuktam āmukham eva hi |
vīthī prahasanaṃ ceti dvividhe nātra lakṣite // RNc_28 //
ity ākhyāya sphuṭaṃ kecit tayoḥ kurvanti lakṣaṇam // RNc_29 //
vīthī-prahasane dve tu rūpakāṇāṃ bhide smṛte ||
yogaḥ sandhir iti jñeyo nāṭya-vidyā-viśāradaiḥ // RNc_30 //
pāñcavidhyāt kathāyās tu prakṛtiḥ pañcadhā smṛtā |
bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryam eva ca // RNc_31 //
yat tu svalpam upakṣiptaṃ bahudhā vistṛtiṃ gatam |
kāryasya kāraṇaṃ dhīrais tad bījam iti kathyate // RNc_32 //

div.p: yathā lalita-mādhave prathama-dvitīyayor aṅkayoḥ kalpite mukha-sandhau nirūḍho rādhā-mādhavayor anurāgo bījam ucyate |

lg.l: vicchinne yad aviccheda-kāraṇaṃ bindur ucyate // RNc_33 //

div.p: yathā tatraive tṛtīya-caturthayoḥ kalpita pratimukha-sandhau kṛṣṇa-pura-gamanādinā mukhya-phale vicchinne tenaiva samāśāsanaṃ etās tūrṇaṃ nayata kiyatīḥ ity ādi sūrya-vākya-śravaṇa-janita-kṛṣṇa-pratyāśāṃ nīre maṅkṣu-mimaṅkṣum (4.10) ityādyuktyā garbhāṅkaś ca binduḥ |

lg.l: sā patākā budhaiḥ proktā yādavāmātya-vṛttavat // RNc_34 //

div.p: yathā tatraiva pañcama-ṣaṣṭhyoḥ kalpite garbha-sandhau paurṇamāsy-uddhava-vṛttaṃ patākā |

lg.l: yat kevalaṃ parārthasya sādhakaṃ ca pradeśa-bhāk |

div.p: yathā tatraiva saptamāṣṭayoḥ kalpite vimarṣa-sandhau yathā nava-vṛndādi-kulādi-vṛttaṃ prakarī ||

lg.l: vastunas tu samastasya sādhyaṃ kāryam iti smṛtam |

div.p: yathātra navama-daśamayoḥ kalpite nirvahaḥaṇa-sandhau rādhā-mādhavayoḥ punaḥ saṅgama-puraḥsara-krīḍādi ||

lg.l: pradhānam aṅgam iti ca tat tu syād dvividhaṃ punaḥ |
pradhānaṃ netṛ-caritaṃ vyāpi kṛṣṇasya ceṣṭitam // RNc_37 //
nityaṃ patākā prakarī cāṅgaṃ bījādayaḥ kvacit // RNc_38 //
bījatvād bījam ādau syāt phalatvāt kāryam antataḥ |
tayoḥ sandhāna-hetutvāt madhye binduṃ muhuḥ kṣipet // RNc_39 //

div.l: yathāyogaṃ patākāyāḥ prakāryāś ca niveśanam // RNc_40 //

lg.l: yad abhram iva līlayā sphuṇam adabhram udbhrājate ||

div.p: yathā lalita-mādhave mukha-sandhau rādhā-mādhavayor anyonya-saṅgamāya vyavasāya ārambhaḥ |
div.l: yatnas tu tat-phala-prāptāv autsukyena tu vartanam // RNc_42 //
div.p: yathā tatraiva pratimukha-sandhau rādhayā kṛṣṇasyānveṣaṇe kṛṣṇena ca gandharva-kṛta-nṛtyādau rādhāvalokāyodyamo yatnaḥ |

lg.l: īṣat prāptir yadā kācit phalasya parikalpyate |

div.p: yathā, tatraiva garbha-sandhau rādhāyāḥ satrājiti samarpaṇ kṛṣṇasya ca lalitā-śaṅkhacūḍa-ratnādi-lābhādinā sambhāvanāyogyatvāt prāptyāśā |
yathā, tatraiva vimarśa-sandhau rādhā-darśanād avighnena phala-saṃsiddhi-niśayān niyatāptiḥ |
div.l: nijābhīṣṭa-phalāvāptir bhaved eva phalāgamaḥ // RNc_43 //

lg.l: patākāyās tv avasthānaṃ kvacid asti na vā kvacit |
patākayā vihīne tu bīja-bindū niveśayet // RNc_44 //
pañcaite sandhayas teṣu mukha-lakṣaṇam ucyate // RNc_46 //
sūcitaḥ sauṣṭavāt tatra yathā lalita-mādhave // RNc_48 //
yuktiḥ prāptiḥ samādhānaṃ vidhānaṃ paribhāvanā // RNc_49 //

div.p:
tatropakṣepaḥ --
upakṣepas tu bījasya sūcanaṃ kathyate budhaiḥ // RNc_50 //
paurṇamāsī -- (hanta rādhā-mādhavayor iti paṭhitvā) vatse gārgi śrūyatām |

lg.l: krāntvā sapta jaganti samprati vayaṃ sarvordhvam adhyāsmahe ||
hriyam avagṛhya gṛhebhyaḥ karṣati rādhāṃ vanāya yā nipuṇā |

div.l: bīja-niṣpatti-kathanaṃ parinyāsa itīryate // RNc_52 //

lg.l: rādhā (saromāñcam): lalide kā kkhu kahnatti sunīadi jeṇa kealaṃ kaṇṇassa jjea
adidhīhonteṇa ummatīkijjahmi || [lalite, kaḥ khalu kṛṣṇa iti śrūyate? Yena kevalaṃ

div.l: samyak prayojanānāṃ hi nirṇayo yuktir iṣyate // RNc_54 //
div.p: yaśodā -- bhaadi candāalī ṇomāliā rāhā māharia sabbāo maha āsāo guṇāsohara-pūreṇa purei | tatthabi baccho bia baccā laiī ṇetta-bhiṅgaṃ sondara-marandeṇa āṇandei || [bhagavati candrāvalī nava-mālikā rādhā mādhavī ca sarvathā mama āśā guṇa-saurabha-pūreṇa pūrayati | tatrāpi vatsa iva vatsā laghvī netra-bhṛṅgaṃ saundarya-makarandena ānandayati | ]
bhagavatī: gokuleśvari | sarveṣāṃ gokula-vāsināṃ īdṛg eva samudācāra iti |
atra rādhāyāṃ sarvato'dhikānāṃ guṇotkarṣāṇāṃ nirṇayo yuktiḥ |
div.l: prājñaiḥ sukhasya samprāptiḥ prāptir ity abhidhīyate // RNc_55 //
div.p: yathā tatraiva (1.51) -- tatra kṛṣṇaḥ (punar utkarṇo bhavan sapulakam)
div.l: bījasya punar ādhānaṃ samādhānam ihocyate // RNc_56 //
div.p: rādhā (sāsraṃ): kundalaie, abi ṇāma imassa ekassa bi hadaṇttassa maggaṃ kkhaṇaṃ bi ārohissadi so maha dhaṇṇassa kaṇṇassa adidhī | [kundalate! api nāma tasyaikasyāpi hata-netrasya mārgaṃ kṣaṇam api ārohiṣyati sa me dhanyasya karṇasyātithiḥ |]
atra svayaṃ rādhayā punar anurāga-bījasyādhānāt samādhānam |
div.l: sukha-duḥkha-karaṃ yat tu tad-vidhānaṃ budhā viduḥ // RNc_57 //
div.p: rādhikā - (dūrataḥ kṛṣṇam īṣad avalokya, janāntikaṃ saṃskṛtena)

(punar avekṣya) haddhī haddhī ppamādo, lalide pekkha pekkha eṇaṃ bamhaāriṇaṃ daṭṭhūṇa vikkhuhidaṃ maha hadahiaam | tā imassa mahāpābassa aggippaveso jebba parāacittam | [ha dhik hā dhik pramādaḥ | lalite prekṣya prekṣya | etaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṣbdhaṃ me hata-hṛdayam | tad etasya mahā-pāpasya agni-praveśa eva prāyaścittam |]
lalitā : halā, saccaṃ kadhesi | tā ṇūṇaṃ sabaṇṇataṇaṃ bhāmedi | [halā, satyaṃ kathayasi, tan nūnaṃ savarṇatvaṃ bhramayati |]

lg.l: kim ayam itarathā me vidravaty antarātmā |

div.p: atra rādhāyāḥ kṛṣṇa-buddhyā viprabuddhyā ca sukha-duḥkha-kathanād vidhānam | atha paribhāvanā -
div.l: ślāghyaiś citta-camatkāro guṇaughaiḥ paribhāvanā // RNc_58 //
div.p:
kula-varatanu-dharma-grāva-vṛndāni bhindan
sumukhi niśita-dīrghāpāṅga-ṭaṅka-cchaṭābhiḥ
yugapad ayam apūrvaḥ kaḥ puro viśva-karmā
marakata-maṇi-lakṣair goṣṭha-kakṣāṃ cinoti || 52 ||
lalitā: halā, so eso de parāṇa-nādho | [halā, sa eṣa te prāṇanāthaḥ |]
atra kṛṣṇasya vaidagdha-saundaryādi-guṇa-nidarśanena ca rādhā-camatkāra-kathanāt paribhāvanā |
div.l: bījasya tu ya udghātaḥ sa udbheda iti smṛtaḥ // RNc_59 //

lg.l: kula-sthitir alaṃ tu me manasi tāvad unmīlati |
na yāvad aparokṣatām idam apaiti vaktrāmbujam || (2.26)

div.l: bījasyottejanaṃ bhedo yad vā saṅghāta-bhedanam // RNc_60 //
div.p: kundalatā - rāhe, akkhalidaṃ tumha sadībbadaṃ, tā alaṃ saaṃ vikkhābideṇa | [rādhe, jāne saskhalitaṃ tava satī-vrataṃ, tad alaṃ svayaṃ vikhyāpitena | ]

viśākhā - (sa-praṇayābhyasūyam) kundalade! kā kkhu abarā tumaṃ bia vaṃsīe tiṇṇi-sañjhaṃ āaḍḍhīadi ? [rādhe, kā khalv aparā tvām iva vaṃśyā trisandhyam ākṛṣyate |] kundalatā (sanarma-smitaṃ, saṃskṛtena) -

lg.l: manaḥ sakhi manāg api tyajati vo na dhairyaṃ yathā || (2.20)

div.p: atra kundalatayā rādhādi-premasyottejanād bhedanāc cātmanas tābhyo bhedaḥ |
div.l: prastutārtha-samārambhaṃ karaṇaṃ paricakṣate // RNc_61 //

lg.l: trapāṃ tyaja kuḍaṅgakaṃ praviśa santu te maṅgalā-
puṣpaṃ vajram upanyāso varṇa-saṃhāra ity api // RNc_64 //

div.l: vilāsaḥ saṅgamārthas tu vyāpāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ // RNc_65 //

lg.l: cakrābhikhyaḥ kim api virahād ākulaḥ kākū-lakṣaṃ
kurvan mukhyas tvayi sa vayasām arthibhāvaṃ tanoti ||4.22||

div.l: smṛtir naṣṭasya bījasya parisarpa iti smṛtaḥ // RNc_66 //
div.p: kṛṣṇaḥ - sakhe satyam āśayaiva kadarthyamāno'smi | yataḥ -

lg.l: dūrān maṇḍalataḥ kṛpāturatayā yat prādurāsīt tadā |
hā dhig vāg-amṛtena tena janitas tasyāḥ punaḥ saṅgama-
pratyāśāṅkura uccakair mama sakhe svāntaṃ haṭhād vidhyati ||10||

div.p: atra rādhā-tirodhānān naṣṭasyānurāga-bījasya punaḥ sūrya-vacanenānusmaraṇāt parisarpaḥ |

lg.l: harer vakṣaḥ-pīṭhaṃ na kila ghanam āliṅgitam abhūd
iti dhyāyaṃ dhyāyaṃ sphuṭati luṭhad antar mama manaḥ || (3.26)

div.p: atra prakaṭam eva duḥkhaṃ vidhutam | yathā vā tatraiva -
div.l: arateḥ śamanaṃ dhīraiḥ śama ity abhidhīyate // RNc_68 //
div.p: vṛndā - nāgarendra! muñca vaimanasyam | sāmprataṃ bhavad-abhīṣṭa-siddhaye śārikāmukhena lalitāṃ sandiśya viśākhayā bhavantaṃ nivedayiṣyāmi |
atra jaṭilayā rādhāyāṃ nītāyāṃ vṛndayā mādhavasyārati-śamanāc chamaḥ |
apaṭhitvā śamaṃ kaścit sa paṭhaty atra tāpanam |
upāyādarśanaṃ yat tu tāpanaṃ nāma tad bhavet || iti |
vṛndā - hā dhik, hā hā dhik | paśya -
div.l: parihāsa-pradhānaṃ yad vacanaṃ narma tad viduḥ // RNc_69 //
div.p: jaṭilā (nāsikāgre tarjanīṃ vinyasya sthitā dhunvantī sāścaryam) are bāliā-bhujaṅga! kaṃ ḍaṃsiduṃ ettha bhammasi | [are bālikā-bhujaṅga! kāṃ ḍaṃśitum atra bhrāmyasi |]
div.l: narma-jātā ruciḥ prājñaiḥ narma-dyutir udāhṛtā // RNc_70 //
div.p: lalitā (smitvā) api sarale, tujjha hiae katthūriāpattabhaṃgaṃ lihantīe mae paccakkhīkidā siviṇa-saṃgiṇāara-kuṃjara bibbhamāsi | tā phuḍaṃ kadhehi, taiajaṇasaṃgajogge tasmiṃ osare dīhasuttā nīvī-sahaarī jhatti ṇikkantā ṇa vetti | [ayi sarale! tava hṛdaye kastūrikāpatra-bhaṅgaṃ likhantyā mayā pratyakṣīkṛtā svapna-saṅgināgara-kuñjara-vibhramāsi | tat sphuṭaṃ kathaya | tṛtīya-jana-saṃyogye tasminn avasare dīrgha-sūtrā nīvī-sahacarī jhaṭiti niṣkrāntā na veti ]

rādhikā (svagatam) kadhaṃ takkidaṃ akkhidhuttāe | (prakāśam, sa-bhrū-bhaṅgam) vāme, kitti aliaṃ āsaṃkasi? [kathaṃ tarkitam atidhūrtayā? vāme, kim ity alīkam āśaṅkase?] (Act 4, paras. 92-93) atra lalitā-narma-jātayā rādhāyā rucyā dhṛtyā vā narma-dyutiḥ |
div.l: uttarottara-vākyaṃ tu bhavet pragamanaṃ punaḥ // RNc_71 //
div.p:
rādhā - baa-ṇaravaī-ṇandaṇaṃ sabandhuṃ, raha-pabarobari pekkhia phphurantam | [vraja-nṛpati-nandanaṃ sabandhuṃ
ratha-pravaropari prekṣya sphurantam]
skhalati mama vapuḥ kathaṃ dharitrī
bhramati kutaḥ kim amī naṭanti nīpāḥ || (3.14)
lalitā - sahi rāhe, mā visīda | pabbada-parikkamobakkamo eso | [sakhi rādhe, mā viṣīda, parvata-parikramopakrama eṣaḥ |]

lg.l: sahacari, parijñātaṃ sadya samastam idaṃ mayā
virama kṛpaṇe bhāvī nāyaṃ harer viraha-klamo
mama kim abhavan kaṇṭhe prāṇā muhur nirapatrapāḥ || (3.15)

div.p: ity atra rādhā-lalitayor uttarottaraṃ pragamanam | atha virodhaḥ -
div.l: yatra vyasanam āyāti virodhaḥ sa nigadyate // RNc_72 //
ruṣṭasyānunayo dhīraiḥ paryupāsanam īritam // RNc_73 //
div.p: jaṭilā - ai ahisārasaggāvejjhāiṇi lalide, eṇhiṃ puttau me ahimaṇṇu bidūre gadotthi, tā suṇṇaṃ gharaṃ mukkia kīsa tue āṇīdā bahuḍī | [ayi abhisāra-mārgopādhyāyini lalite! idānīṃ putrako me'bhimanyur vidūre gato'sti | tat śūnyaṃ gṛhaṃ muktvā kasmāt tvayā nītātra vadhūṭī ?]

lalitā (saśaṅkam ātma-gatam) haddhī, ḍāinīe aḍāhiṇa-paidīe ḍdahiṭhammi buṭhṭhiāe | (prakāśam) ayye gaggīe bhaṇidaṃ ajja māhabīpupphehiṃ pūido sūro surahikoḍppado hodutti māhabī-maṇḍabaṃ laṃhikhadā mae rāhiā, tā ppasīda ppasīda | [hā dhik! ḍākinyā dakṣiṇa-pravṛttyā dagdhāsmi vṛddhayā | ārye, gārgyā bhaṇitam, adya mādhavī-puṣpaiḥ pūjitaḥ sūryaḥ surabhi-koṭi-prado bhavati | iti mādhavī-maṇḍapaṃ lambhitā mayā rādhikā | tat prasīda prasīda |
atra ruṣṭāyā jaṭilāyā lalitayāpy anunayāt paryupāsanam |
div.l: pariśeṣo vidhānaṃ yat puṣpaṃ tad iti saṃjñitam // RNc_74 //
div.p: vidūre kaṃsārir mukuṭita-śikhaṇḍāvalir asau pure gaurāṅgībhiḥ kalita-parirambho vilasati |

na kānto'yaṃ śaṅke surapatidhanur dhāma-madhuras
taḍil-lekhāhārī girim avalalambe jaladharaḥ || (3.40)
div.l: vajraṃ tad iti vijñeyaṃ sākṣān niṣṭhura-bhāṣaṇam // RNc_75 //
div.p: jaṭilā (pṛṣṭhataḥ parikramya putrasya hastam ākarṣantī sākṣepam) re goula-kisorī-laṃpaḍao, are paraghara-laṇṭhanao | kahaṃ tumaṃ bi appaṇo puttaṃ maṇṇissadi jaḍilā ? [re gokula-kiśorī-lampaṭa, are paragṛha-luṇṭhaka | kathaṃ tvām apy ātmanaḥ putraṃ maṃsyati jaṭilā |]
atra jaṭilāyāḥ putraṃ prati niṣṭhura-bhāṣaṇaṃ vajram |
div.l: yuktibhiḥ sahito yo'rthaḥ upanyāsaḥ sa ucyate // RNc_76 //

lg.l: adya prāṇa-parārdhato'pi dayite dūraṃ prayāte harau
hā dhig duḥsaha-śoka-śaṅkubhir abhūd viddhāntarā rādhikā |
tenāsyāḥ pratiṣedham artha-carite tvaṃ mā kṛthā mā kṛthāḥ
kṣīṇeyaṃ kṣaṇam atra suṣṭhu viluṭhaty ārta-svaraṃ roditum || (3.29)

div.l: atra yukti-sahitārthatā prakaṭaiva | kecit upanyāsaḥ prasādanam iti (SāhD 6.93)
div.p: jaṭilā - kulaputti, sireṇa me sābidāsi | [kulaputri, śirasā me śāpitāsi |]
div.l: savarṇopagamanaṃ varṇa-saṃhāra iṣyate // RNc_77 //

lg.l: daityācāryas tad-āsye vikṛtim aruṇatāṃ malla-varyāḥ sakhāyo
gaṇḍaunnatyaṃ khaleśāḥ pralayam ṛṣi-gaṇā dhyāna-muñcāsram ambā |
romāñcaṃ sāṃyugīnāḥ kam api nava-camatkāram antaḥ surendrāḥ
lāsyaṃ dāsāḥ kaṭākṣaṃ yayur asita-dṛśāṃ prekṣya raṅge mukundam || (4.4)

div.p: atra daityācārya-nāradādayaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ kṣitīśa-sāṃyugīnādayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ, mallā dāsādayo vaiśyāḥ śūdrādayaś ca iti varṇa-saṃhāraḥ |

lg.l: saṅgrahaś cānumānaṃ ca toṭakādhibale tathā // RNc_81 //

div.l: abhūtāharaṇam tat syād vākyaṃ yat-kapaṭāśrayam // RNc_82 //

lg.l: nikhilā śikhini nayann api sukhāni jātyāsitāpāṅgī |

div.l: ... rūpaṃ vākyaṃ vitarkavat // RNc_83 //
div.p: kṛṣṇaḥ (sānandam) - sakhe, katham anubhūta-pūrveva kāpi śiñjita-saraṇī prasahya mām ādrīkaroti | [*NOTE: kṛṣṇaḥsāśaṅkam]
div.l: sotkarṣaṃ vacanaṃ yat tu tad udāharaṇaṃ matam // RNc_84 //

lg.l: gīrvāṇair udahāri hāri parito yā sāra-sampan-mayī |
dhatte hanta tathā na kāntibhir iyaṃ rājñaḥ kumārī yathā || (5.30)

div.l: bhāva-jñānaṃ kramo yad vā cintyamānārtha-saṅgatiḥ // RNc_85 //
div.p: atra nava-vṛndāyā rādhāyā bhāva-jñānāt citnyamāna-hari-cihnasya rādhayā darśanād vā kramaḥ |
div.l: saṅgrahaḥ sāmadānārtha-saṃyogaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // RNc_86 //

lg.l: tvam asi yena varo duhitur varaḥ || (5.37)
ākṛtyā śriyam api mādhavīṃ kim enāṃ

div.l: ... vacaḥ saṃrambhi toṭakam // RNc_87 //

lg.l: vinighnante taṃ ca prabalam atha bhallūka-nṛpatiḥ |
parābhūya svairī tam api mura-vairī tava dhanaṃ
tad-āhartā pāpa tvam asi patitas tāpa-jaladhau || (6.15)

div.l: budhair adhibalaṃ proktaṃ kapaṭenādhivañcanam // RNc_88 //
śatru-vairādi-sambhūtaṃ bhayam udvega ucyate // RNc_89 //
div.p: candrāvalī (janāntikam) sahi māhavi ! pekkha | eso ajja-uttassa sacca-saṃkappidā seibimaddaṇo saccabhāmāe sondera-pūro dhīraṃ bi maṃ āndoledi | [sakhi mādhavi, paśya | eṣa āryaputrasya satya-saṅkalpitā setu-vimardanaḥ satyabhāmāyāḥ saundarya-pūro dhīrām api mām āndolayati |]
div.l: śatru-vyāghrādi-sambhūtā śaṅkā syād iha sambhramaḥ // RNc_90 //

lg.l: saptiḥ saptī ratha iha rathaḥ kuñjaro me
tūṇas tūṇo dhanur uta dhanur bhoḥ kṛpāṇī kṛpāṇī |
kā bhĪḥ kā bhīr ayam ayam ahaṃ hā tvaradhvaṃ tvaradhvaṃ
rājñaḥ putrī bata hṛta-hṛtā kāminā vallavena ||(5.30)

div.l: garbha-bīja-samutkṣepam ākṣepaṃ paricakṣate // RNc_91 //

lg.l: masṛṇita-śikho yaḥ prāptodbhūd manāg iva mārdavam |
punar api balād indhe rādhā-viyoga-mayaḥ śikhī || (6.43)

div.p: asya suhṛdartha-sampādane garbhitasya punaḥ lalitā-darśanenotkṣepād ākṣepaḥ |

lg.l: bījavān garbha-nirbhinnaḥ sa vimarśa itīryate // RNc_92 //
prarocanā vivalanam ādānaṃ syus trayodaśa // RNc_95 //
cirād adya svapne mama vividha-yatnād upagate
gṛhītvā hā hanta tvaritam atha tasminn api rathaṃ
kathaṃ pratyāsannaḥ sa khalu puruṣo rāja-puruṣaḥ || (7.22)
kiṃ nas tena viramyatāṃ katham asau śokāgnir ujjvālyate |

div.p: kṛṣṇaḥ - priye, yuṣmākam adbhutam ākarṇyatāṃ sāmpratam ahaṃ sūra-saugandhikam āhariṣyan pāṇḍavena saha khāṇḍavāḍavīṃ prāviśam | tatra mṛgān āhaṇḍino gāṇḍīvinaḥ śyenābhyāṃ nigṛhītayoḥ pakṣiṇor ekaḥ prāhety ādi |
div.l: ...dravo guru-tiriskriyā // RNc_96 //
div.p: mādhavī - bhaṭṭo-dārie kāsāre pasāridaṇi abbadaṃ vagīṃ samaria hasāmi | [bhartṛ-dārike kāsāre prasārita-nija-vratāṃ bakīṃ smṛtvā hasāmi |]

nava-vṛndā (latāntare sthitvā) hanta katham aṅgīkṛta-rādhā-prasādhanā devīyam upalabdhā | tad eṣa mādhavo yāvad enāṃ rādhikāṃ pratītya na pramādam ādadhāti tāvad ahaṃ padyam ekaṃ hārītena hārayāmīti |
atra rādhātvena candrāvalī-jñānād utpannasya virodhasya śamanāt śaktiḥ |
div.l: ...tarjanodvejane dyutiḥ // RNc_97 //
div.p: rādhā (sabhayam) hanta, caṃcala caṃcarīa ciṭṭha ciṭṭha | esā līlā-kamaleṇa tāḍemi tumaṃ dhiṭhṭhaṃ | [cañcala cañcarīka tiṣṭha tiṣṭha | eṣā līlā-kamalena tāḍayāmi tvāṃ dhṛṣṭam |]
ity atra bhramarādy-udvegena bhramaraṃ prati tarjanena ca dyutiḥ |

lg.l: prasaṅgaṃ kathayanty anye gurūṇāṃ parikīrtanam // RNc_98 //
carcāṃ siñcati śoṣayaty api mitho vispardhate vāsakṛt
netra-dvandvam uraś ca yad-virahato bāṣpāyamāṇaṃ mama |
prāpyotsaṅgam atarkitaṃ mama kathaṃ sā rādhikā vartate || 8.3 ||

div.l: apamānādi-karaṇaṃ chalanaṃ parikīrtitam // RNc_99 //
div.p: kṛṣṇaḥ - hanta kali-kaṇḍūla-tuṇḍa-mātra-sarvasve tamomayi mādhavike! viramyatām | dvayoḥ paraṃ jetum aśakyeyaṃ candrāvalī |
div.l: vyavasāyas tu sāmarthyasyākhyāpanam udīryate // RNc_100 //

lg.l: bibhrāṇā hata-jīvite praṇayitāṃ nāhaṃ sakhi prāṇimi |
krūreyaṃ na virodhinī yadi bhaved āśāmayī śṛṅkhalā
prāṇānāṃ dhruvam arbudāny api tasya tyaktuṃ sukhenotsahe || 7.13 ||

div.l: kaścit tu, vyavasāyas tu vijñeyaḥ pratijñā-hetu-sambhavaḥ || ity āha (SāhD 6.103) |

lg.l: veṇur vaktre racayati ruciṃ hanta cetas tato me
rūpaṃ viśvottaram api harer nānyad aṅgīkaroti || (7.6)

div.l: virodhanaṃ virodhoktiḥ saṃrabdhānāṃ parasparam // RNc_101 //
div.p: candrāvalī (solluṇṭha-smitam) ai loluhe āli, kīsa maṃ anāpekkhia taṃ ṇiamahābbadaṃ tue suṭṭhu paḍiṭṭhidam | [ayi lolupe āli, kasmān mām anāpṛcchya tan nija-mahā-vrataṃ tvayā suṣṭhu pratiṣṭhitam |] rādhikā - dei, saraṇṇassa jaṇassa saṃrakkhaṇe akkhamāsi tahabi parihasesi | ṇūṇaṃ īsarīṇāṃ kkhu juttaṃ edaṃ | [devi, śaraṇyasya janasya saṃrakṣaṇe akṣamāsi tathāpi parihasasi | nūnaṃ īśvarīṇāṃ khalu yuktam etat |]

atha prarocanā -
siddhavad bhāvino'rthasya sūcanāt syāt prarocanā // RNc_102 //

nava-vṛndā -
alaṃ vilāpaiḥ samaya-kramasya
durūha-rūpā gatayo bhavanit |
śaran-mukhe paśya saras-taṭīṣu
khelanty akasmāt khalu khañjarīṭāḥ || 7.5 ||
ity atra kañjarīṭa-dṛṣṭāntena bhāvi-kṛṣṇa-saṅgamasya sūcanāt prarocanā |

lg.l: sahacari parikleśo yo'bhūn mayā kila sevitaḥ |
ahaha yad imāḥ śyāma-śyāmā puro mama vallavī-

div.p: atra pratimā-sandarśanānandena bhāvi-kṛṣṇa-saṅgamanasya siddhavat sūcanāt prarocanā |
kṛṣṇaḥ (savismayam) ko'yaṃ mādhuryeṇa mamāpi mano haran maṇi-kuḍyam avaṣṭambya puro virājate | (punar nibhālya) hanta katham atrāham eva pratibimbito'smi | (iti sautsukyam)

aparikalita-pūrvaḥ kaś camatkāra-kārī sphurati mama garīyān eṣa mādhurya-pūraḥ | ayam aham api hanta prekṣya yaṃ lubdha-cetāḥ
sarabhasam upabhoktuṃ kāmaye rādhikeva ||8.34|
div.l: ādānaṃ kārya-saṅgrahaḥ // RNc_103 //

lg.l: āloke kamaleṣaṇasya sajalāsāre dṛśau na kṣame
vṛttiḥ kāpi babhūva saṅgamanaye vighnaḥ kuraṅgī-dṛśaḥ || 8.11 ||

div.p: kaścit tu vidrava-vivalana-chalanādy atra na paṭhitvā kheda-pratiṣedha-chādanāni paṭhanti lakṣayanti ca |
div.l: manaś-ceṣṭā-samutpannaḥ śramaḥ kheda itīryate // RNc_104 //

lg.l: balān māṃ durlīlaḥ kam iva karavai hanta śaraṇam || 7.1 ||

div.l: īpsitārtha-pratīghātaḥ pratiṣedha itīryate // RNc_105 //
div.p: rādhā (samīkṣya sakhedam ātmagatam) - kahaṃ iṃdīareṇa rahaṃgīe saṃgamiṭṭhaṃ ahiṇaṃdide maccharā kalahaṃsī milidā | [kathaṃ indīvareṇa rahaṅgyā saṅgamituṃ abhinandite matsarā kalahaṃsī militā |
yathā saptame nava-vṛndā (praviśya) sakhi, mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ paśya -

lg.l: rādhādīnāṃ tu sarvāsāṃ kumārīṇām avāptitaḥ // RNc_108 //
sandhir virodho grahtanaṃ nirṇayaḥ paribhāṣaṇam // RNc_109 //

div.p: iti nirvahaṇasyāṅgāny uktāny asya caturdaśa | tatra sandhiḥ -

lg.l: tvām āsādya mamedam indriya-kulaṃ rādhe muhur modate || (9.9)

div.l: ... virodhaḥ kārya-mārgaṇam // RNc_111 //
div.p: atra punaḥ sahasā kṛṣṇa-darśana-rūpasya sad-arthasyopakṣepād grathanam |
div.l: nirṇayas tv anubhūtoktiḥ // RNc_112 //

lg.l: smarasi kim iva tāsāṃ śāradīnāṃ kṣapāṇām || (9.47)

div.l: paribhāṣā mitho jalpaḥ parivādo'thavā bhavet // RNc_113 //
div.p: madhumaṅgalaḥ -bhodi kiṃ ti āadāsi? [bhavati kim ity āgatāsi?]
sukaṇṭhī - imassa paṇhottarassa sadikkhaṃ aṇṇaṃ bi mahuraṃ suṇidum | [asya praśnottarasya sadṛkṣam anyad api madhuraṃ śrotum |]
madhumaṅgalaḥ -bhodi paṇṇottaraṃ bi tue suṇidam? [bhavati praśnottaram api tvayā śrutam]
sukaṇṭhī - ṇa keaṇaṃ idaṃ jjeba | [na kevalam idam eva |]
sukaṇṭhī - jā kiṃ pi diṭhṭhaṃ taṃ gadua deie ṇivedissaṃ | [yat kim api dṛṣṭaṃ tad gatvā devyai nivedayiṣyāmi |]
atra vidūṣaka-sukaṇṭhyor mitho jalpaḥ | dvitīyo yathā tatraiva -

lg.l: asi viṣakaṇṭhī-kaṭhine kim iti sukaṇṭhīti bhaṇyate ceṭi |
athavā kā mama śastā bhadrety abhidhīyate viṣṭiḥ || 9.21

div.l: śuśrūṣādy-upasampannā yat prasādaḥ prasannatā // RNc_114 //
div.p: kṛṣṇaḥ (saharṣam) sukaṇṭhike! bāḍham asminn arthe duṣkaras te mayā niṣkrayaḥ |
kṛṣṇaḥ (sānandam) cireṇādya gokula-vāsinām ivātmānam abhimanyamānaḥ pramoda-mugdho'smi |
div.l: samayo duḥkha-saṅkṣayaḥ // RNc_115 //
div.p: rādhikā (mukhād añcalam apāsya, savikrośam) hā hā kadhaṃ piasahī me lalidā | hā kadhaṃ baccalā bhaavadī | hā kadhaṃ ajjiā muharā | [hā hā kathaṃ priyasakhī me lalitā | hā kathaṃ vatsahā bhagavatī | hā kathaṃ āryā mukharā |] (ity ānandena ghūrṇantī bhūmau skhalati |)
bhaavadi bahiṇīe karaṃ geṇhiduṃ maha baaṇeṇa abbhatthīadu... ajja-utto | [bhagavati bhaginyāḥ karaṃ grahītuṃ mama vacanena abhyarthyatām āryaputraḥ |]
atra yaśodādi-samāgamāl labdhyasya rādhikā-rūpārthasya candrāvalī-prārthanena sthairya-kṛtiḥ |
div.l: mānādyāptiś ca bhāṣaṇam // RNc_116 //
div.p: nandaḥ - vatse, parasparasya prāṇādhikyaṃ bhajantyau saubhāgyavatyau bhūyāsam |
div.l: adbhutārtha-pariprāptir upagūhanam ucyate // RNc_117 //
div.p: yatha tatraiva - rādhā (sarvāsāṃ pādān abhivādya sotkaṇṭham) -- kusaliṇī kiṃ me bahiṇī candāalī | [kuśalinī kiṃ me bhaginī candrāvalī |]
candrāvalī (gāḍhaṃ pariṣvajya) - bahiṇī esāmhi dujjaṇī-hata-candāaliā | [bhaginī, eṣāsmi durjanī hata-candrāvalikā |] (iti roditi)
rādhikā (sānandaṃ sasambhramaṃ pādayoḥ patantī) haddhi haddhi, biḍambidahmi hada-debbeṇa | [hā dhik! hā dhik!, viḍambitāsmi hata-daivena |]
div.l: mukhya-kāryasya saṃsargaḥ pūrva-bhāvaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // RNc_118 //
div.p: paurṇamāsī - yaśodā-mātaḥ, upasthito'yaṃ sarvo'bhiṣeka-sambhāraḥ | tad alaṅkriyatāṃ prathamaṃ rādhayā saha parva-vedī tataḥ krameṇa kumārībhiś ca |

atra mukhya-kāryasya rādhā-mādhavayoḥ pariṇaya-mahotsavasya saṃsargāt pūrva-bhāvaḥ | kecit pūrva-vākyaṃ kecit pūrva-bhāṣām iti paṭhanto lakṣayanti (SāhD 6.113) - pūrva-vākyaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ yathoktārthopadarśanam | yathā tatraiva (nepathye) -

lg.l: svayaṃ devyā tasmin pitur iha nibandhe muditayā |
kumārīṇāṃ tāsām ayam upanayan ṣoḍaśa kṛtī

div.p: atra pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇena tṛtīyāṅke yad uktaṃ etās tūrṇaṃ nayata kiyatīr ity ādinā punaḥ svayaṃ gamanaṃ tasyaivopadarśanam |
div.l: kṛtārthatopasaṃhāraḥ sarvābhīṣṭopalaksitaḥ // RNc_119 //
div.p: kṛṣṇaḥ (sarvam abhinandya janāntikam) prāṇeśvari rādhe prārthayasva kim ataḥ paraṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇi | (ity ārabhya)

lg.l: yāmī me samagaṃs tu saṃstavavatī śvaśrūś ca goṣṭheśvarī |
saṃvṛttaḥ kim ataḥ paraṃ priyataraṃ kartavyam atrāsmi me || (10.36) ||

div.l: maṅgalāśaṃsanaṃ samyak praśastir abhidhīyate // RNc_120 //

lg.l: pañcānām eva sandhīnāṃ catuṣaṣṭiḥ kramād iha |
sāphalyaṃ kāryam aṅgānām ity ācāryāḥ pracakṣate // RNc_122 //
keṣāṃcid eṣām aṅgānāṃ vaiphalyaṃ kecid ūcire |
daśarūpaka-kārādyās tat sarveṣāṃ na sammatam // RNc_123 //
sandhy-antarāṇi yojyāni tac ca tatraikaviṃśatiḥ // RNc_126 //
gotra-skhalitam ojaś ca dhīḥ krodhaḥ sāhasaṃ bhayam // RNc_127 //
māyā ca saṃvṛtir bhrāntir dūtyaṃ hetv-avadhāraṇam |
svapna-lekhau madaś citram eṣāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate // RNc_128 //

div.l: bhavet sāma priyaṃ vākyaṃ svānuvṛtti-prakāśanam // RNc_129 //

lg.l: svasti syān madirekṣaṇe kṣaṇam api tvām antarā me kutaḥ |
nākāśe vṛṣabhānujāṃ śriyam ṛte niṣpadyate svaś-chaṭā || (10.10)

div.l: dānaṃ tu kathitaṃ dhīraiḥ priayavastu-samarpaṇam // RNc_130 //
div.p:
yathā tatraiva aṣṭame - mādhavī - bhaṭṭi-dārie sahattheṇa tue gaṃṭhidā esā sūrasoaṃdhia-mālā |
[bhartṛ-dārike, svahastena tvayā grathitaiṣā sūra-saugandhika-mālā |] 21
candrāvalī (mālām ādāya) ajja-utta, esā kautthuhassa sahabāsiṇī hodu | [ārya-putra, eṣā kaustubhasya saha-vāsinī bhavatu |] (iti vakṣasi vinyasyati |) 22
div.l: bhedas tu kapaṭālāpaiḥ suhṛdāṃ bheda-kalpanā // RNc_131 //
div.p: jaṭilā - (apavārya, sālīka-sneham) ayi bacche, sadā maṃ palohia lalidā ahisāredi tti maha puttassa purado bahūḍiā aliaṃ jebba tumaṃ sandūsedi | tā kitti lāhavaṃ sahesi | [ayi vatse, sadā māṃ pralobhya lalitā abhisārayati iti mama putrasya purato vadhūṭikālīkam eva tvāṃ dūṣayati | tat kim iti lāghavaṃ sahase? |] 105
atra jaṭilayā kapaṭena lalitāyā bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ |
div.l: daṇḍas tv avinayādīnāṃ dṛṣṭyā śrutyā ca tarjanam // RNc_132 //

lg.l: rādhāparādhini muhus tvayi yan na śastaṃ
śakṣyāmi kartum akhilāṃ gurur eṣa khedaḥ |

div.l: tāt-kālikī ca pratibhā pratyutpanna-matir matā // RNc_133 //
div.p: lalitā - kundalade, assudapubbā esā kīrisī ricā bahueṇa paḍijjai | [kundalate, aśruta-pūrvaiṣā kīdṛśī ṛg baḍukena paṭhyate |]

madhumaṅgalaḥ (sāṭṭahāsam) buṭṭie, āhīrīmuddhiā tumaṃ rī rī gīdaṃ ccea jāṇāsi | amhaa vedassa tumaṃ kāsi | tā suṇāhi kosum esvaīe sāhāe taia vaggassa lalaṇāsuhaarī ricā esā | [vṛddhe, ābhīrī-mugdhikā tvam, rī rī gītam eva jānāsi | asmad-vedasya tvaṃ kāsi | tat śṛṇu kausumeṣavyāḥ śākhāyās tṛtīya-vargasya lalanāśubhakarī ṛg eṣā |]
div.l: vadhas tu jīvita-droha-kriyā syād ātatāyinaḥ // RNc_134 //
tad-gotra-skhalitaṃ yat tu nāma-vyatyaya-bhāṣaṇam // RNc_135 //
div.p: kṛṣṇaḥ (sānanda-smitam) priye! diṣṭyā sudhādhārāṃ pāyito'smi | tad alam āryaputreti kūpāmbunā |
div.l: ojas tu vāg-upanyāso nija-śakti-prakāśakaḥ // RNc_136 //
div.p: suparṇaḥ - deva bāḍham ātapatra-phaṇāpaṭalīla-dhīyasaḥ kiṅkarasyāsya garutmataḥ sakṛt-pakṣa-vikṣepa-kelaye'pi na paryāptim eṣyati, dūre viśrāmyatu sakhā me sudarśanaḥ kalpānta-kuśalaḥ |
div.l: iṣṭārtha-siddhi-paryantā cintā dhīr iti kathyate // RNc_137 //
div.p:
rādhikā - kundalade! ppasīda anukampehi | ajja sā kkhu sāmalā komudī jeṇa pīdā | tā jebba puṇṇavantaṃ appaṇo vāmaloaṇaṃcalaṃ ettha khiṇṇe manda-bhāiṇi jaṇe khaṇaṃ appehi | [kundalate! prasīda anukampaya | adya sā khalu śyāmalā kaumudī yena pītā | tam eva puṇyavantam ātmano vāmalocanāñcalam etasmin
khinne manda-bhāgini jane kṣaṇam arpaya |] 38

kundalatā - (sāsūyam ivālokya) alaṃ para-purise giñcantīhiṃ tumhehiṃ saṃbhāsaṇeṇa (iti dhāvantī jaṭilām upetya) ajje! kahaṃ paḍhamaṃ brahmaṇaṃ ṇa maggesi, jo kkhu suraṃ puābaissadi | [alaṃ para-puruṣe gṛdhyantībhir yuṣmābhiḥ sambhāṣaṇena | ārye kathaṃ prathamaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ na mṛgayase, yaḥ khalu sūryaṃ
pūjāpayiṣyati |] 39
jaṭilā - bacche, saccaṃ kahesi | tā pasīda | āṇehi ekkaṃ biakkhaṇaṃ bamhaṇam | [vatse, satyaṃ kathayasi | tasmāt prasīda | ānayaikaṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ brāhmaṇam |] 40
atra rādhikotkaṇṭhātiśaya-darśanena jaṭilā-samaksam eva vipraveśena kṛṣṇa-praveśa-cintanaṃ kundalatāyāḥ dhīḥ |
div.l: krodhas tu manaso dīptir aparādhādi-darśanāt // RNc_138 //
div.p:
yathā dvitīye (nepathye) -
phullaty ārān nava-vicakile keli-kuñjeṣu phullā
śephālīnāṃ skhalati kusume hanta caskhāla bālā |
mīlaty uccaiḥ kuvalaya-vane mīlitākṣī kilāsīt
vācyaṃ kiṃ vā param upahasīr mā praṇāma-cchalena || (2.7)
div.l: svajīvita-nirākāṅkṣo vyāpāraḥ sāhasaṃ bhavet // RNc_139 //
div.p:
rādhikā (sakhedam ātmagatam) sāhu re kīra sāhu | bāṭṭhaṃ aṇuggahidamhi, tā dāṇiṃ dullahā-hiṭṭhadāṇadacchiṇaṃ titthavaraṃ kāliadehaṃ ppavisiya appāṇaṃ sappāṇaṃ turiaṃ ubahirassam | [sādhu re kīra sādhu | bāḍhaṃ anugṛhītāsmi, tad idānīṃ durlabhābhīṣṭha-dāna-dakṣiṇaṃ tīrtha-varaṃ kāliya-hradaṃ praviśya
ātmānaṃ sarpebhyas tvaritam upahariṣyāmi |] 98
div.l: ... māyā kaitava-kalpanā // RNc_140 //
div.p: vṛndā (sānandam) kiṃ nāma rādhā-sakhīnāṃ dhiyām akṣuṇṇaṃ paśya paśya |

lg.l: vaktraṃ hanta tad eva kharvaṭa-ghaṭī-ghoṇaṃ vigāḍhekṣaṇam |
vyastā saiva gatiḥ karīra-kusuma-cchāyaṃ tad evāmbaraṃ
mudrā kāpi tathāpy asau piśunayaty asya svarūpa-cchaṭām || (4.33)

div.l: saṃvṛttiḥ svayam uktasya svayam ācchādanā bhavet // RNc_141 //
div.p: kṛṣṇaḥ (vṛndām avalokya) satyabhāmā, mayi katham (ity ardhokteḥ | navavṛndā dṛśaṃ kūṇayati |)
kṛṣṇaḥ (vibhāvya, svagatam) hanta, katham asau devī | bhavatu saṃvarītuṃ prayatiṣye | (prakāśam)

lg.l: satī katham asau bhāmā devī nādya prasīdati |
nidānam avidaṃ sadyaḥ khidyate hṛdayaṃ mama || (9.59)

div.p: atra svayam uktasya satyabhāmety asya śabdasya satī katham abhāmā ity arthāntareṇa saṃvaraṇāt saṃvṛttiḥ |
div.l: bhrāntir viparyaya-jñānaṃ prasaṅgasyāpi niścayāt // RNc_142 //

lg.l: atra bhāvi nirātaṅka-māro me ramaṇaṃ mama |

div.p: candrāvalī - māhavi, ṇūṇaṃ diṭṭhahmi jaṃ vidabbhaṃgabhutti bāharīadi | [mādhavi nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsmi, yad vidarbhaāṅga-bhūr iti vyāhriyate |]
atra vidarbhāṅgabhūr ity asya vigata-darbha-bhūmitvājñānaṃ devyāḥ bhrāntiḥ |
div.l: dūtyaṃ tu sahakāritvaṃ durghaṭe kārya-vastuni // RNc_143 //
div.p: atra jaṭilā-prātikūlyena kundalatāyā durghaṭe rādhā-saṅgama-kārye sahakāritvaṃ dūtyam |
div.l: niścayo hetunārthasya mataṃ hetv-avadhāraṇam // RNc_144 //
div.p: vṛndā - sthāne khalv iyaṃ tava cintā | tathyam eṣā duṣṭenākrāntā trilokīm eva santāpayet | yataḥ -

lg.l: tāḥ kasyārtaṃ dadhati na khal-sparśa-dagdhās taruṇyaḥ |
bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam anupamāṃ klāntim āsādayantī
mandākrāntā bhavati jagataḥ kleśa-dātrī hi cintā || (2.9)

div.p: atra citra-nidarśanopabṛṃhitena sarva-guṇottama-strī-duḥkha-rūpeṇa hetunā sarva-jana-duḥkhasya niścayād dhetv-avadhāraṇam |
div.l: svapno nidrāntare kiñcij jalpitaṃ paricakṣate // RNc_145 //

lg.l: hā dhik paśya murāntako'yam urarīcakre rathārohaṇam |
manye tanvi patat tuṣāra-kapaṭāc cakranda yāminy api || (7.10)

div.l: vivakṣitārtha-kalitā patrikā lekha īritaḥ // RNc_146 //

lg.l: kṛṣṇa-ghanas tvām amṛtais tṛṣitāṃ candrakavatīṃ siñca || (5.7)
bile kva nu vililyire nṛpa-pipīlikāḥ pīḍitāḥ
pinasmi jagadaṇḍakaṃ nanu hariḥ krudhaṃ dhāsyati |
śacī-gṛha-kuraṅga re hasasi kiṃ tvam ity unnadann

div.l: citraṃ tv ākārāṇāṃ vilokanam // RNc_147 //

lg.l: tathaiva darśanād eṣām anaiyatyena sandhiṣu // RNc_148 //
evam aṅgair upāṅgaiś ca suśliṣṭaṃ rūpaka-śriyaḥ |
śarīraṃ vas tv alaṅkuryāt ṣaḍ-triṃśad bhūṣaṇaiḥ sphuṭam // RNc_149 //
garhaṇānunayau bhraṃśo leśaḥ kṣobho manorathaḥ // RNc_152 //

div.l: guṇālaṅkāra-bahulaṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ smṛtam // RNc_154 //

lg.l: śaṅke śaṅkara-maulir abhyudayate rājā purastād diśi ||9.10||

div.p: atra prasāda-mādhuryādi-guṇānām anuprāsa-śleṣānumānādy-alaṅkārāṇāṃ ca sattayā bhūṣaṇam |
div.l: vākyam akṣara-saṅghāto bhinnārthaṃ śliṣṭa-śabdakam // RNc_155 //
div.p: atra candrāṇām āvalyā paricitānīty atra candrāvalī nāma pratibhānād akṣara-saṅghātaḥ |
div.l: sa hetur iti nirdiṣṭo yat sādhyārtha-prasādhakam // RNc_156 //
div.p: madhumaṅgalaḥ (nirīkṣya) piabaassa! pekkha kāe bi aṇurāiṇīe sevā kidatthi | [priya-vayasya, paśya kayāpy anurāgiṇyā sevā kṛtāsti |]

lg.l: karotkampaṃ tasyā vadati tilakaṃ kuñcitam idaṃ

div.l: eka-deśa-vilokena prāptiḥ śeṣābhiyojanam // RNc_157 //

lg.l: asyās tvayā sakhi guror yad iyaṃ gṛhītā

div.p: atra locanasaundarya-dīkṣā-lālasasya ekadeśasya tvayi vilokanena sālaṃ tvayā labdheti viśeṣārthasya yojanāt prāptiḥ |
div.l: vākyaṃ yad-gūḍha-tulyārthaṃ tad udāharaṇaṃ matam // RNc_158 //
div.p:
kundalatā (sasmitam) rāhi, dehi me pāritosiaṃ, yaṃ suṭṭhu dullahaṃ de abbhatthidaṃ mae ṇibbāhidam | [rādhe, dehi me pāritoṣikam | yat suṣṭhu durlabhaṃ
te'bhyarthitaṃ mayā nirvāhitam |] 80
rādhikā (vakram avekṣya) kundaladie, kiṃ me abbhatthidaṃ? [kundalate, kiṃ me'bhyarthitam?] 81

kundalatā - aī, kīsa bhuaṃ bhaṃguresi, jaa sūrārāhaṇaṃ bhaṇāmi | [ayi, kasmād
bhruvaṃ bhaṅgurayasi, yat sūryārādhanaṃ bhaṇāmi |] 82

lg.l: jvalito janaḥ kṛśānau śāmyati taptaḥ kṛśānunaivāyam |
bhagavati kṛtāgaso me bhagavān evādhunā śaraṇam || (6.17)

div.p: rādhikā (mādhavam avalokya, sānandam ātmagatam) bho bhaavaṃ, āṇanda-pajjaṇṇa, ṇa kkhu rundhīai jalāsāreṇa ukkaṃṭhidā tavassiṇīhi me diṭṭhīcaurī | kkhaṇaṃ pibedu esā dullahaṃ imassa muhacandassa joṇham | [bho bhagavan, ānanda-parjanya, na khalu rundhyatāṃ jalāsāreṇotkaṇṭhitā tapasvinī me dṛṣṭ-cakorī | kṣaṇaṃ pibatv eṣā durlabhām asya mukha-candrasya jyotsnam |] 99

lg.l: dhāvaty ākramituṃ muhuḥ śravaṇayoḥ sīmānam akṣṇor dvayī
pauṣkalyaṃ harataḥ kucau bali-guṇair ārabdhamānaṃ tataḥ |
muṣṇītaś calatāṃ bhruvau caraṇayor udyad-dhanur bibhrame

div.p: siddhair arthaiḥ samaṃ yatrāprasiddho'rthaḥ prakāśate | śliṣṭa-lakṣaṇa-citrārthā sā śobhety abhidhīyate || ity āha | (SāhD 6.176)
div.l: aniścayāt tu yad vākyaṃ sandehasya nigadyate // RNc_159 //

lg.l: nāsty anyaḥ sahakāritā-paṭur iha prāṇī na jānīmahe
hā goṣṭheśvari kīdṛg adya tapasāṃ pākas tavonmīlati || (2.29)

div.l: sva-pakṣe darśanaṃ hetor dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya-siddhaye // RNc_160 //
div.p: atra dhīre'pi jane vikāra-sad-bhāve sādhye tat-sādhakasya calana-rūpa-vikārasya hetoḥ sarvaṃsahāyāṃ bhuvi darśitatvād dṛṣṭāntaḥ |

lg.l: abhiprāyas tv abhūtārtho hṛdyaḥ sāmyena kalpitaḥ |
abhiprāyaṃ pare prāhur mamatāṃ hṛdy avastuni // RNc_161 //
dvaitaṃ hanta samakṣayan muhur asau citrīyate cāraṇaḥ |

div.p: atrābhūtārtha-rūpasya bhagavad-dvitīyatvasya naṭe kalpanam abhiprāyaḥ | hṛdy avastuni sva-saundarye bhogecchayā mamatā vā |
atra iṣṭasya lalitā-darśanasyātarkitopapannatvāt siddhiḥ | kaścit tu bahūnāṃ kīrtanaṃ siddhir abhipretārtha-siddhaye ity (SāhD 6.186) āha | tad yathā daśame
kṛṣṇaḥ - priye tvad-āsyaṃ paśyato me nopamāna-vastūni hṛdayam ārohanti naḥ | yataḥ -

lg.l: dhatte na sthiti-yogyatāṃ caraṇayor aṅke'pi paṅkeruhaṃ

div.l: prasiddhir loka-vikhyātair arthaiḥ svārtha-prasādhanam // RNc_163 //
div.p:
nava-vṛndā (svagatam)
vasantī śuddhānte madhurima-parītā madhuripor
iyaṃ tanvī sadyaḥ svayam iha bhavitrī karagatā |
vṛtāṅgīm uttuṅgair avikalamadhūlī-parimalaiḥ
praphullāṃ rolambe nava-kamalinīṃ kaḥ kathayati || (6.28)
atra loka-vikhyātasya praphulla-kamalinī-rolamba-saṅgamasya kathanena svārthasya rādhā-mādhavayoḥ saṅgamasya sādhanaṃ prasiddhiḥ |
div.l: dākṣiṇyaṃ tu bhaved vācā paracittānuvartanam // RNc_164 //
div.p: lalitā (sālīkam) ajje, pekkha | eso kaṇho moṭṭimaṃ ahma viḍambaṇaṃ karedi | [ārye, paśya | eṣa kṛṣṇaḥ balād asmad-viḍambanaṃ karoti |] 117
atra syandanānyathānupapattyā netrasya candrakāntamayatvaa-kalpanād iyam arthāpattiḥ | yathā vā daśame -

candrāvalī - dea! tuhma vilāsa sokkhāṇaṃ bāhādeṇa kida mahāparāhamhi | tā kāruṇṇeṇa āṇabehi jadhā goṭhṭhabaiṇo goṭṭhaṃ gadua basaṃtī tumaṃ suhiṇaṃ karemi | [deva! tava vilāsasaukhyānāṃ vyāghātena kṛta-mahāparādhāsmi | tat kāruṇyena ājñāpaya yathā goṣṭhapater goṣṭhaṃ gatvā vasantī tvāṃ sukhinaṃ
karomi | 102

lg.l: siddhān bahūn pradhānārthān uktvā yatra prayuñjate |
viśeṣa-yuktaṃ vacanaṃ vijñeyaṃ tad viśeṣaṇam // RNc_166 //
lakṣmīvān iha dakṣiṇānila-sakhaḥ sākṣān madhur modate
rādhā yady abhisāram atra kurute so'yaṃ mahān eva me

div.p: atra prasiddhārthān madhu-vṛndāvanādīn uktvā rādhābhisārasya vaiśiṣya-kathanād viśeṣaṇam | kaścit tu lekhiṣyamāṇaṃ nava-nava-sudhā-sambandho'pi (1.33) ity ādi-padyam atrodāharati | [*NOTE: Full verse given below, at 171 (atiśayaḥ).]

lg.l: bahūnāṃ tu prayuktānāṃ padānāṃ bahubhiḥ padaiḥ |
uccayaḥ sadṛśārtho yaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ padoccayaḥ // RNc_167 //

div.p: atra matyādīnāṃ ghūrṇādi-kriyāsu alivrajādibhiḥ samāveśād ayaṃ padoccayaḥ | kaścit tu uccayo'rthānurūpo yaḥ padānāṃ sa padoccayaḥ ity (SāhD 6.180) āha | yathā daśame - [*NOTE: saṃcayo]
atra havir vilāyam iti luptopamayā'pratyakṣasya citta-dravasya kathanaṃ tulya-tarkaḥ | kaścit tu tulyatarko yad arthena tarkaḥ prakṛta-gāminā ity (SāhD 6.180) āha | yathā caturthe -

jaṭilā - ṇūṇaṃ nūurasahena āhaḍiṭṭā ede haṃsā haṃsaṇaṃdi-ṇījalādo vaṇe dhāanti | tā bahūḍiā ṇādidūre habissadi | [nūnaṃ nūpura-śabdena ākarṣitā ete haṃsā haṃsa-nandinī-jalāt vane dhāvanti | tad vadhūṭikā nātidūre bhaviṣyati |]

atrotkaṇṭhitasyaa sādhyasya sādhanāni tṛṇāsvāda-śaithilyādīni | yad vā agre lekhyaṃ śaraṇam iha yo bhrātuḥ (5.25) ity ādi padyam atrodāharaṇaṃ jñeyam | kaścit tu vicāro yukti-vākyair yad apratyakṣārtha-darśanam ity (SāhD 6.182) āha | atroktam udāharaṇam api saṅgacchate |
div.l: vicārasyānyathābhāvo vijñeyas tad-viparyayaḥ // RNc_169 //

lg.l: vicitrāyāṃ kṣauṇyām ajaniṣata kanyāḥ kati na vā
kaṭhorāṅgī nānyā nivasati mayā kāpi sadṛśī |
mukundaṃ yan muktvā samayam aham adyāpi gamaye
dhig astu pratyāśām ahaha dhig asūn dhiṅ mama dhiyam || (6.21)

div.l: guṇātipāto vyatyasta-guṇākhyānam udāhṛtaḥ // RNc_170 //

lg.l: yad eṣa rati-taskaraḥ pathi nirudhya sādhvīr balāt

div.p: atra prakaṭaś ca guṇātipātaḥ | kaścit tu guṇātipātaḥ kārye yad viparītaṃ guṇān prati ity āha (SāhD 6.184), yathā pañcame candrāvalī (saṃskṛtena) -

lg.l: śaraṇam iha yo bhrātus tasya pratīpa-vidhāyinā
hita-kṛd api tā devyās tasyāḥ samagram upekṣaṇam |
gatir avikalo yo me tasya priyasya ca vismṛtir
bata hatavidho vāme sarvaṃ prayāti viparyayam || (5.25)
bahūn guṇān kīrtayitvā sāmānyena ca saṃśritān |
viśeṣaḥ kīrtyate yatra jñeyaḥ so'tiśayo budhaiḥ // RNc_171 //
sarasija-vanīṃ mlānāṃ kurvann api prabhayā svayā |
vidhur api kalā-pūrṇo'py uccaiḥ kuraṅga-dharaḥ śaśī

div.l: niruktaṃ niravadyoktir nāmāny artha-prasiddhaye // RNc_172 //

lg.l: nītas tanvi mukhena te paribhavaṃ bhrū-kṣepaivikrīḍayā
bibhyad viṣṇu-padaṃ jagāma śaraṇaṃ tatrāpy adhairyaṃ gataḥ |
ekaḥ saṃśabdyate tat tu vijñeyaṃ guṇa-kīrtanam // RNc_173 //

div.p: yathā dvitīye, kṛṣṇaḥ (puro rādhāṃ paśyann apavārya) -

lg.l: yatra saṅkīrtayan doṣān guṇam arthena darśayet |
guṇān vā kīrtayan doṣaṃ darśayed garhaṇaṃ hi tat // RNc_174 //

div.p:
mādhavī - dea, kaṭorappā esā bhaṭṭi-dāriā suṭṭhu tābaṃ soḍhuṃ pāredi jaṃ tumha paccakkhaṃ ccea caṃdabhāāmaṃdire jalaṃtaṃ jalana-kuṃḍaṃ jala-keli-kuṇḍaṃ biṇṇādabadī | [deva, kaṭhorātmaiṣā bhartṛdārikā suṣṭhu tāpaṃ soḍhuṃ pārayati tat tava pratyakṣam eva candrabhāgā-mandire jvalantaṃ jvalanta-kuṇḍaṃ
jala-keli-kuṇḍaṃ vijñātavatī |] 149

kṛṣṇaḥ (svagatam) - mādhavi, sādhu sādhu yad atra snehātirekaṃ sūcayantī samaye
sakhya-sevāṃ vitanoṣi | 150
atra kaṭhorādi-rūpasya doṣasya kathanam api kṛṣṇa-viṣayānurāga-guṇa-kīrtanatayā paryavasitam | dvitīyaṃ yathā caturthe -

kundalatā - bīrāhimaṇṇo, puṇṇabadī me sahī rāhā | jāe dakkhiṇā saccabādiṇī siṇiddhā tumha mādā sussū laddhā | [vīrābhimanyo! puṇyavatī me sakhī rādhā,
yayā dakṣiṇā satyavādinī snigdhā tava mātā śvaśrūr labdhā |] 133
atra guṇakīrtanam apy arthato doṣa iti garhaṇam |

lg.l: ayaṃ kaṇṭhe lagnaḥ śaśimukhi janas te praṇayavān
kṛthāḥ patyāvatyāhitam idam uro me vidalati || 5.35 ||

div.l: patanāt prakṛtād arthād anyasmin bhraṃśa īritaḥ // RNc_175 //
div.p: dea, imāṇaṃ pemma-komalāṇaṃ akkharāṇaṃ mā kkhu ṇaṃ ahirūbaṃ jāṇāhi | jaṃ esā ṇa hodi | [deva, eṣā prema-komalānām akṣarāṇāṃ mā khalv etām abhirūpāṃ jānīhi | yad eṣā satyā na bhavati |] 194
kṛṣṇaḥ - sādhu mādhavike! sādhu | madīya-hṛdayāśaṅkā tvayā nirastā | tad indra-jālābhijñayā nava-vṛndayaiva nirmiteyaṃ māyikī devī rasālamūla-vartinī khalu satyā |

atra satyā-śabdasya prakṛtārthaṃ satyabhāmā-rūpaṃ parityajya tathārtha-lakṣaṇasya kathanād bhraṃśaḥ | kaścit tu kathayanti budhāḥ bhraṃśaṃ vācyād anyatarad-vacaḥ ity āha | yathā prathame, kṛṣṇaḥ - [*NOTE: SāhD 6.187 has dṛptādīnāṃ bhavad bhraṃśo vācyād anyatarad vacaḥ |]

lg.l: sarojākṣi parokṣaṃ te kadāpi hṛdayaṃ mama |
na spraṣṭum apy alaṃ bādhā rādhā tvākramya gāhate || 1.42

div.p: atra vācyād rādhāyā asparśād anyad bādhākramaṇaṃ bhraṃśaḥ |

lg.l: katham api na parasyāḥ pāṇisaṅgo vidheyaḥ || 5.38||

div.p: paurṇamāsī - mukunda! gokula-kumārī-kulāni candrāvalī-mātrāvaśeṣāṇi durvidagdhena vidhinā kṛtāni | tad atra kā kṣatiḥ?
atra candrāvalī-mātrāvaśeṣāṇīti viśeṣaṇavad vacaḥ kṛṣṇeṅgita-jñāpakatayā saṃvṛttam iti leśaḥ |
div.l: kṣobhas tv anya-gate hetāv anyasmin kārya-kalpanaṃ // RNc_176 //
div.p:
atra sūryātapeṣu candrāvaly-aṅga-saṅgateṣu tat-kārya-bhūtasya tāpasya kṛṣṇena svasmin kalpanāt kṣobhaḥ | kaścit tu kṣobha-sthāne saṅkṣepaṃ pañhan lakṣayanti -
saṅkṣepo yat tu saṅkṣepād ātmāny arthe prayujyate | (SāhD 6.192) yathāṣṭame -
kṛṣṇaḥ - devi, triloka-kakṣāsu kiṃ tavābhīṣṭaṃ? tad abhivyajya nija-nideśa-bhājanam anyatayaiva paryāpta-samasta-niśreyase preyasi vidhehi prasāda-mādhurīm |
div.l: manorathas tu vyājena vivakṣita-nivedanam // RNc_177 //
div.p: rādhikā - (sautsukyaṃ puro dṛṣṭvā) halā lalide, pekkha pekha dhaṇṇā esā taraṃga-lehā jā khu sevāla-ballī ṇibaddha-pāaṃ ṇaṃ haṃsiaṃ moābedi | tā phuḍaṃ bhisiṇīpattantarideṇa kalahaṃseṇa saṃghaḍaissadi | [halā lalite, paśya paśya dhanyā eṣā taraṅga-lekhā yā khalu śaivāla-vallī-nibaddha-pādām enāṃ haṃsikāṃ mocayati | tat sphuṭaṃ bisinī-patrāntaritena kalahaṃsena saṃghaṭṭiṣyati |] 71

lg.l: anukta-siddhir eṣā syād ity āha bharato muniḥ // RNc_178 //

div.p: [*NOTE: First reference to Bharata, whom he has not been following very closely. Nāṭ 16.169 = prastāvenaiva śeṣo'rthaḥ kṛtsno yan na pratīyate | vacanena vinānukta-siddhiḥ sā parikīrtitā ||]

halā labaṃga-kuḍuṅge āharantī tumaṃ buṃdāaṇa-bāsiṇā matta-kalahindeṇa āadua hattheṇa gahīdahatthāsi saṃbuttā | tado saṃbhamena ghusmantīe tuha haḍheṇa oṭṭha-pallaaṃ ḍaṃsanteṇa tinā bāme tthabaasmi phurantatikkhakāmaṅkusaṃ kara-pukkharaṃ | [halā lavaṅga-kuñje āharantī tvaṃ vṛndāvana-vāsinā matta-kalabhendreṇa āgatya hastena gṛhīta-hastāsi saṃvṛttā | tataḥ sambhramena ghūrṇantyas tava haṭheṇa oṣṭha-pallavaṃ daṃśatā tena vāme stavake
sphurat-tīkṣṇa-kāmāṅkuśaṃ kara-puṣkaram |] 91

lg.l: sādṛśyaṃ yatra saṅkṣobhāt tat sārūpyaṃ nirūpyate // RNc_179 //

div.p: jaṭilā - are āhiṇḍiā kīsa mukhaṃ ḍhakesi? jaṃ de bijjā na bikkāidā | [are āhiṇḍika" kasmān mukham ācchādayasi? yat te vidyā na vikrītā |] (iti prasahya sammukhayati) 126
abhimanyuḥ - (svagatam) haddhī haddhī bāuliaāe ammāe lajjāpajjāulo kidamhi | tā ido abakkamissam | [hā dhik, hā dhik! bātūlikayā ambayā lajjā-paryākulaḥ kṛto'smi | tad ito'pakramiṣyāmi |] 127
div.l: bahūni kāraṇāny eva sā mālety abhidhīyate // RNc_180 //
div.p: rādhā - lalide ppasīda ppasīda suṭhṭhu saṃkaulamhi | [lalite prasīda prasīda suṣṭhu śaṅkākulāsmi |] (punaḥ saṃskṛtena)

lg.l: tadā namraṃ yāce sakhi rahasi saṅcāraya na mām || 2.19

div.p: atra sāyaṃ gamanādi-bahu-kāraṇānāṃ sveṣṭa-sañcāraṇābhāvāya kathitatvāt mālā |

lg.l: yat prasannena manasā pūjyaṃ pūjayitur vacaḥ |
stuti-prakāśanaṃ tat tu jñeyaṃ madhura-bhāṣaṇam // RNc_181 //
keyaṃ tasya samṛddhaye tava vibho rājendratā-grāmaṭī
śauṭīryeṇa camatkṛtiṃ tad api naḥ kām apy asau puṣyati ||(5.17)

div.p: praśna evottare yatra sā pṛcchā parikīrtitā ||
atra he śuka, pītāṃ kāntiṃ bibhratī mayā mṛgyamāṇā sā dṛṣṭeti praścne, he pītāṃśuka, tvayā mṛgyamāṇā sā mayā dṛṣṭety uttareṇa pṛcchā |
div.l: śāstrānusāri yad vākyam upadiṣṭaṃ tad ucyate // RNc_182 //

lg.l: preyasyaḥ paśupālikā viharato yās tatra vṛndāvane
rādhā tatra varīyasīti nagarīṃ tām āśritāyāṃ kṣitau
sevāṃ devi samasta-maṅgala-karī yasyās tvam aṅgīkuru || (6.19)

div.l: jātyādi-varṇanaṃ dhīrair dṛṣṭam ity abhidhīyate // RNc_183 //

lg.l: procyate'nyat traystriṃśat saṅkhyā kaścid vibhūṣaṇam // RNc_184 //
muner asammattatvena tat tu sarvam upekṣitam |

div.l: arthasya tu pradhānasya bhāvyavasthasya sūcakam // RNc_186 //

lg.l: tatrādyaṃ triprakāraṃ syād dvitīyaṃ tv ekam eva hi |
evaṃ caturvidhaṃ jñeyaṃ patākā-sthānakaṃ budhaiḥ // RNc_188 //
dagdhaṃ hanta dadhānayā vapur idaṃ yasyāvalokāśayā
soḍhā marma-vipāṭane paṭur iyaṃ pīḍātivṛṣṭir mayā |

div.p: atra pratibimbe so'yaṃ jīvita-bandhur ity upacāra-prayogeṇa bhāvinaḥ kṛṣṇasya sūcanāt sahasārtha-sampatti-rūpam idaṃ patākā-sthānakam |
div.l: (nepathye) durlabhaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa vṛttas te viprakarṣataḥ | 90
div.p: atra bhaviṣyato rādhā-saṅgama-durlabhatvasya sūcanād idaṃ śliṣṭaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ patākā-sthānakam |

lg.l: arthopakṣepaṇaṃ yat tu līnaṃ savinayaṃ bhavet |

div.p: (sarvataḥ prekṣya) priya-vayasya! kiyad dūre sā vṛndāṭavī ?
sphuṭac-caṭula-campaka-prakara-rocir ullāsinī madottarala-kokilāvali-kala-svarālāpinī | marāla-gati-śālinī kalaya kṛṣṇa-sārādhikā (ity ardhokte)
kṛṣṇaḥ (savyagram) vayasya! nāhaṃ paśyāmi | tad āśu darśaya | kva sā me rādhikā ?
div.l: madhumaṅgalaḥ -- ... mukunda vṛndāṭavī || (7.17)
div.p: atra sajjalpitena madhu-maṅgala-vākyena bhāvino rādhā-darśanasya sūcanācchliṣṭottaraṃ nāma tṛtīyaṃ patākā-sthānam |

lg.l: upanyāsena yuktas tu caturthaṃ parikīrtitam // RNc_192 //
vastu sarvaṃ dvidhā sūcyam asūcyam iti bhedataḥ |
rasa-hīnaṃ bhaved atra vastu tat sūcyam ucyate // RNc_193 //
adarśanīyam aṅke tad avaśyaṃ vācyam eva cet |
arthopakṣepakair etat sūcayet suṣṭhu paṇḍitaḥ // RNc_194 //

div.l: bhaved viṣkambhako bhūta-bhāvi-vastv aṃśa-sūcakaḥ // RNc_195 //

lg.l: sa śuddho miśra ity u kto miśraḥ syān nīca-madhyamaiḥ // RNc_196 //
prājñair yavanikāntaḥsthair adṛśyair yā tu nirmitāḥ |
ādāv aṅkasya madhye vā cūlikā nāma sā bhavet // RNc_199 //
yatra syād aṅka ekasminn aṅkānāṃ sūcanākhilā |
tad-aṅkāsyam iti prāhur bījārtha-khyāpakaṃ ca yat // RNc_200 //
prathamāṅke yathā suṣṭhu suhitaṃ nikhilaṃ sphuṭam // RNc_201 //
sūcanaṃ tad avicchedyair yat tad aṅkāsyam īritam // RNc_202 //
prathamoktārtham evedaṃ vadanty aṅka-mukhaṃ budhāḥ // RNc_203 //
avibhāgena sarveṣāṃ bhāviny aṅke praveśanam // RNc_204 //
aṅkayor ubhayor madhye sa vijñeyaḥ praveśakaḥ // RNc_205 //
yadā syān nīrasaṃ sūcyam āmukhānantaraṃ tadā |
yadā tu sarasaṃ vastu mūlād eva pravartate |
ādāv eva tadāṅkaḥ syād āmukhākṣepa-saṃśrayaḥ // RNc_207 //
prārambhe yady asūcyaṃ syād aṅkam evātra kalpayet // RNc_208 //
asūcyaṃ tu dvidhā dṛśyaṃ śravyaṃ cādyaṃ tu darśayet |
dvedhā dvitīyaṃ svagataṃ prakāśaṃ ceti bhedataḥ // RNc_209 //
svagataṃ svaika-vijñeyaṃ prakāśaṃ tad dvidhā bhavet |
dvidhā vibhajyate tac ca janāntam apavāritam // RNc_211 //
yā mithaḥ kriyate dvābhyāṃ taj janāntikam ucyate // RNc_212 //
ayuto bahubhiḥ kāryair bīja-saṃharaṇena ca // RNc_214 //
vrīḍā-heturbhir anyaiś ca bībhataiś ca vinā kṛtaḥ // RNc_217 //

div.p:
atha garbhāṅkaḥ
aṅka-prasaṅgād garbhāṅka-lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyate mayā // RNc_218 //

lg.l: aṅkasya madhye yo'ṅkaḥ syād asau garbhāṅka īritaḥ |
arthopakṣepakair hīno yutaḥ pātrais tu pañcaṣaiḥ |

div.p:
nātiprapañcetivṛttaḥ prastutārthānubandhakaḥ|
prathamāṅke na kartavyaḥ so'yaṃ kāvya-viśāradaiḥ // RNc_221 //

atha sāmānya-nirṇayaḥ -
nāṭake'ṅkā na kartavyā pañca-nyūnā daśādhikāḥ // RNc_222 //

lg.l: anyonyena tirodhānaṃ na kuryād rasa-vastunoḥ // RNc_223 //
yat syād anucitaṃ vastu nāyakasya rasasya vā |
viruddhaṃ tat parityājyam anyathā vā prakalpayet // RNc_224 //
tad apy anyathayed dhīmān na vaded vā kadācana // RNc_225 //
aṅkeṣv api nibadhyāni kecid evaṃ pracaksate // RNc_226 //
prāyas tāny api santy eva tasmin lalita-mādhave |
kvacid atra viniṣpādyaṃ dhīrair ākāśa-bhāṣitam // RNc_227 //
anyenānuktam apy anyo vacaḥ śrutvaiva yad vadet |
iti kiṃ bhaṇasīty etad bhaved ākāśa-bhāṣitam // RNc_228 //
tatra bhāṣā dvidhā bhāṣā vibhāṣā ceti bhedataḥ // RNc_229 //
āsāṃ saṃskāra-rāhityād viniyogo na gadyate // RNc_230 //

div.p: bhāṣā dvidhā saṃskṛtā ca prākṛtī ceti bhedataḥ |

tatra saṃskṛtā -
saṃskṛtā devatādīnāṃ munīnāṃ nāyakasya ca // RNc_231 //

tatra prākṛtī -
ṣoḍhāntimā prākṛtī syāc chaurasenī ca māgadhī // RNc_233 //

lg.l: atra tu prākṛtaṃ strīṇāṃ sarvāsāṃ niyataṃ bhavet // RNc_234 //
ye nīcāḥ karmaṇā jātyā teṣāṃ ca prākṛtaṃ smṛtam // RNc_235 //
āsām eva tu gāthāsu mahārāṣṭrī smṛtā budhaiḥ // RNc_236 //
tathā vidūṣakādīnāṃ ceṭānām api kīrtitā // RNc_237 //
kadācid anuvādaṃ ca kāraṇāni pracakṣate // RNc_240 //
jātā nārāyaṇād etā madhu-kaiṭabhayor vadhe // RNc_242 //
catasro vṛttayo dhīraiḥ proktā nāṭyasya mātaraḥ // RNc_243 //
bhāraty ārabhaṭī caiva sātvatī kaiśikī tathā |

div.p: bhāratī saṃskṛtair yuktā vṛttiḥ syāc caturaṅgikā |

lg.l: aṅgāny asyās tu catvāri saṅkṣiptir avapātanam // RNc_247 //

div.p:
tatra saṅkṣiptiḥ -
saṅkṣiptir uktā saṅkṣipta-vastu-sṛṣṭir mahādbhutā // RNc_248 //

lg.l: vidhinā hate śiśu-kule tādṛśam aparaṃ haris tathā vyatanot |
viramatu parasya vārtāṃ svayam eva visismaye sa yathā ||

div.p:
athāvapātanam - vibhrāntir avapātaḥ syāt praveśa-drava-vidravaiḥ | yathā -
nighnan vighnam ivāgrataḥ kuvalayāpīḍaṃ mṛdu-krīḍayā
tuṅgāṃ raṅga-bhuvaṃ praviśya tarasā pratyarthināṃ trāsanaḥ |
dṛpyan-malla-davāmbudaś cala-dṛśā kṣudrān api drāvayan
paśyārād garuḍāyate saruḍayaṃ kaṃsorage keśavaḥ ||

atha vastūtthāpanam -
tad-vastūtthāpanaṃ yat tu vastu māyopakalpitam // RNc_249 //

yathā -
daurjanyāni hṛdi sphuṭāni kapaṭa-snehena saṃvṛṇvatī
māyā-kalpita-sundarī madhurimā lebhe vrajaṃ pūtanā |
tasyāḥ suṣṭhu tathā payodhara-rasaḥ prītaḥ śiśu-krīḍayā
vaikuṇṭhena haṭhād yathā na sa punaḥ mātus tathā pāsyate ||

atha sampheṭaḥ -
sampheṭaḥ syāt samāghātaḥ kruddha-saṅkruddhayojitaḥ // RNc_250 //

yathā -
cāṇūra-mallena yathā murārer
anyonyam āsīd guru-samprahāraḥ |
kaṃsasya yenānakadundubheś ca
santāpa-cintābhir uraḥ paphāla ||

lg.l: aṅgāny asyās tu catvāri saṃlāpottāpakāv api |
saṅghātya-parivartau cety eṣāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate // RNc_252 //
parasparaṃ gabhīroktiḥ saṃlāpa iti kīrtyate // RNc_253 //

div.p:
yathā -
vayaṃ bālās tulyaiḥ saha racayituṃ yuddham ucitaṃ
puro yūyaṃ mallāḥ prakaṭita-karālācala-rucaḥ |
madenonmattānāṃ mṛdula-tanubhiḥ kaḥ kalabhakaiḥ
karīndrāṇāṃ dhīraḥ pariṇamana-raṅgaṃ racayati ||
athotthāpakaḥ - preraṇaṃ yat parasyādau yuddhāyotthāpakas tu saḥ |

yathā -
luñchann asmi puras triviṣṭapa-purī-saubhāgya-sāra-śryaṃ
gīrvāṇśvara-pārijātam amarīkandarpa-sandarpadam |
paulomī-kuca-kumbhakeli-makarī-vyāpāra-vaijñānikaḥ
pāṇis tena hi dakṣiṇaḥ katham asua dambholim udyac-chate ||

atha saṅghātyaḥ -
prabhāva-mantra-devādyaiḥ saṅghātyaḥ saṅgha-bhedanam // RNc_254 //

lg.l: hareḥ kaṃsopekṣāṃ vadhita bata sākṣān madhupurī ||

div.p: atha parivartakaḥ - prārabdha-kāryād anyasya karaṇaṃ parivartakaḥ |

yathā -
vrajabhuvi guru-garvāt kurvatas tīvra-vṛṣṭiṃ
hṛdi bhavad-anubhāvād adya-bhītir mamāsīt |
tvam asi kila kṛpālur dogdhu-kāmo'pi kāmaṃ
tad iha mayi śaraṇye gokulendra prasīda ||

lg.l: samanvitā bhaved vṛttiḥ kaiśikī ślakṣṇa-bhūṣaṇā // RNc_255 //
aṅgāny asyās tu catvāri narma-tat-pūrvakā ime // RNc_256 //

div.p: sphañjaḥ sphoṭaś ca garbhaś cety eṣāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate |

lg.l: agrāmyaḥ parihāsaḥ syān narma tat tu tridhā matam |
gacchāmy acyuta darśanena bhavataḥ kiṃ tṛptir utpadyate
kiṃ tv evaṃ vijana-sthayor hata-janaḥ sambhāvayaty anyathā |
āśliṣyan pulakotkarāñcita-tanur gopīṃ hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||

div.p:
veśena yathā rasārṇava-sudhākare (1.273) -
abhyudyate śaśini peśala-kānta-dūtī
santāpa-saṃvalitamānasa-locanābhiḥ |
agrā hi maṇḍana-vidhir viparīta-bhūṣā
vinyāsa-hāsita-sakhījanam aṅganābhiḥ ||

lg.l: savyāṃ smeramukhī dṛśaṃ madhubhidaḥ smere mukhāmbhoruhe |
bhṛṅgodbhāsini dakṣiṇāṃ tu kiratī krīḍā-nikuñje muhuḥ
sūrye rajyati sacchalaṃ vicinute tapāya puṣpāvalim ||

div.p:
veśena, yathā -
yad upahasasi māṃ sadābhisārot-
suka-hṛdayām abhitas tad atra yuktam |
vapuṣi hari-kathā-prasaṅga-mātre
tava ca kathaṃ pulakālir unmimīla ||

tatra vācā, yathā -
vraja-rāja-kumāra mā kṛthāḥ
stuti-mudrābhir analpa-cāturīm |
animitta-viśaṅkitena te
vacasāhaṃ guruṇāsmi bodhitā ||

lg.l: guṃjāphallaṃ bba aharaṃ sahi pekkhantī pamodāmi ||
roṣāt tāmarakapola-kāntini mukhe dṛṣṭyā nataṃ pādayor
utsṛṣṭo guru-sannidhāv api vidhir dvābhyāṃ na kālocitaḥ ||

div.p:
atha śuddha-hāsyajam -
śuddha-hāsyajam apy uktaṃ tadvad eva tridhā budhaiḥ // RNc_262 //

tatra vācā, yathā -
vṛddhe candra iti pratāraya na mām ajñāsiṣaṃ mad-bhayān
nikṣiptaṃ navanīta-piṇḍam upari sthāne'dya rādhāmbayā |
gūḍhaṃ pātayitāsmi dīrghatarayā yaṣṭyeti vācaṃ harer
indu-nyasta-dṛśo niśamya mukharā kṣemaṃ hasantī kriyāt ||

lg.l: prekṣya hariṃ vidhir ahasīn mudira-cchanno gabhīro'pi ||
tad dvidhā mukham aṅgaṃ tu tad dvayaṃ pūrvavat tridhā // RNc_263 //
pratyāsīdati paśya rākṣasa-patiḥ sākṣād ayaṃ pāhi māṃ
ity utkrośati mugdha-vallava-śiśau smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||
yady ullaṅghya giraṃ visarpati tataḥ svāṅge vraṇaṃ pāṇijaiḥ
kurvann eva kṛtaṃ tvayeti jaratī-laksāya vakṣyāmy aham |
ity ukte svaram ākulām iva bhayād ālokya rādhāṃ punaḥ
stabdhībhūta-gatiṃ hariḥ smita-mukhaḥ śliṣyan mudaṃ vaḥ kriyāt ||

div.p:
atha narma-sphañjaḥ -
narma-sphañjaḥ sukhodyogo bhayārto nava-saṅgamaḥ // RNc_264 //

yathā -
sāśaṅkaṃ kṣipator dṛśaṃ pratidiśaṃ vrīḍā-jaḍa-svāntayor
yātā kvāsi niśīti tīvra-jaratī-vācādhika-trastayoḥ |
goṣṭha-dvāri niveśitasya kuhare go-granthi-rāśes tadā
rādhā-mādhavayor abhūt kvaṇikaras tasmin navaḥ saṅgamaḥ ||

atha narma-sphoṭaḥ -
narma-sphoṭo bhāva-leśaiḥ sūcito'lpa-raso mataḥ // RNc_265 //

lg.l: netur vā nāyikāyā vā vyāpāraḥ svārtha-siddhaye |
pracchādana-paro yas tu narma-garbhaḥ sa ucyate // RNc_266 //
samaneṣye dhūrtaṃ tam aham iti jalpan nata-mukhīṃ
priyāntām āliṅgan harir arati-khedaṃ haratu vaḥ ||
preyaḥ śṛṅgāra-hāsyeṣu proktā vṛttis tu kaiśikī // RNc_268 //
prāyo raseṣu sarvatra bhāratī karuṇādiṣu // RNc_269 //
